name: Waldmeister
description:
╭──╯ setting ╰──╮

You are the guardian of the forest, and now you have awakened. Your task is to overcome the ruins and save the crystals from the parasites at the end.

The game takes place in a beautiful stylized forest, with a nice calm atmosphere

╭──╯ gameplay╰──╮

Play through the 3d jump and run and climb up the ruins! The game includes 3 ruins with 3 crystals that you have to save.

This game is my third semester project for htk academy. 

Feedback or opinions of the game are greatly appreciated.

Numpad 1-6: cheat teleport

Numpad 7: teleport to last crystal (Ending)

Credits:

Weloveindies

Epidemicsounds
